price: 26. Badanaa inta malag jooga samooyinka, aysan shafeecadoodu waxba taraynin in Alle u idmo maahee cidduu doono oo ka  Raalli yahay.
arabic: ۞ وَكَم مِّن مَّلَكٖ فِي ٱلسَّمَٰوَٰتِ لَا تُغۡنِي شَفَٰعَتُهُمۡ شَيۡـًٔا إِلَّا مِنۢ بَعۡدِ أَن يَأۡذَنَ ٱللَّهُ لِمَن يَشَآءُ وَيَرۡضَىٰٓ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wakam min malakin fī al-samāwāti lā tugh'nī shafāʿatuhum shayan illā min baʿdi an yadhana al-lahu liman yashāu wayarḍā
